entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:46 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
